fields.name: fourthCharacter
fields.label: Fourth Character
fields.description: The character to be used as the 4th character in PAN (default: P)

fields.name: invalidFormatErrorMessage
fields.label: Invalid Format Error Message
fields.description: Error message shown when PAN format is invalid
fields.default: PAN must be in format: 5 letters (4th configurable), 4 numbers, 1 letter

fields.name: invalidFourthCharacterErrorMessage
fields.label: Invalid Fourth Character Error Message
fields.description: Error message shown when 4th character is not as configured

fields.name: invalidLettersErrorMessage
fields.label: Invalid Letters Error Message
fields.description: Error message shown when letters are not valid

fields.name: invalidNumbersErrorMessage
fields.label: Invalid Numbers Error Message
fields.description: Error message shown when numbers are not valid

fields.name: invalidLastCharacterErrorMessage
fields.label: Invalid Last Character Error Message
fields.description: Error message shown when last character is not a letter
fields.default: Last character must be a letter

fields.name: lengthErrorMessage
fields.label: Length Error Message
fields.description: Error message shown when PAN length is incorrect
fields.default: PAN must be exactly 10 characters long
